data.lore: To some, Nasus is a demigod who walks among the ruins of an ancient civilization; to others, he is nothing more than a myth. Legend speaks of his dominion over death and time. Millennia ago, he stood at the apex of Shuriman society as curator and guardian. He now roams the arid wastes, seeking to release his brother Renekton from the grip of madness.
data.name: Nasus
data.title: the Curator of the Sands

spells.tooltip:
Active: Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Passive: Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.
spells.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Active: Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Passive: Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.
spells.name: Siphoning Strike
spells.sanitizedDescription: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

spells.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.
spells.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.
spells.name: Wither
spells.sanitizedDescription: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.

spells.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }} and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }} and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.
spells.name: Spirit Fire
spells.sanitizedDescription: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

spells.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Attack Range by {{ e2 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, and drains nearby enemies' max Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Attack Range by {{ e2 }}. While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.
spells.name: Fury of the Sands
spells.sanitizedDescription: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, and drains nearby enemies' max Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.

passive.name: Soul Eater
passive.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
